title: Application Data Schema
description: A unified schema for all data managed by the application, including backend-stored todos and client-stored theme preferences. Version: 1.0.0

id.description: The unique identifier for the todo item.

text.description: The content or description of the todo item.

status.description: The current status of the todo item.

dueDate.description: The due date of the todo item in ISO 8601 format. Can be null if no due date is set.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the todo item.

flagged.description: Indicates if the todo item is flagged for importance.

version.description: The constant version number for this schema, which is 1.

todos.description: The list of todo items, managed by the backend API.

theme.description: The UI theme preference, stored in localStorage.
